ratings.comment: Sreya's lectures are hard to understand and EXTREMELY repetitive.  Although, she is an amusing professor and doesn't get through that much material making her class pretty easy.

Sreya is pretty funny. Exams are ridiculously easy, papers are pretty easily graded. Lectures probably could have been more interesting at points considering the material, but eh. I recommend Lindsay as TA, she's hilarious.
Hard to understand sometimes. Do not get her as a TA because she will treat this like its a real class. Easy class if you don't have her as a TA also.
Loved hearing about Bollywood from her! She was great.

She is the worst teacher I have ever had! She is about 10 min late to almost every class! She takes forever to grade, will tell you to redo your speech and leaves town so you can't get a hold of her for help, she texted during a speech. The class is way, way more work than only 2 credits
Sreya is always willing to meet with you. She's extremely helpful and engaging and makes class relevant... definitely get her for 250 if possible!

Sreya Mitra is the****! By far the best class i've ever had. She was very willing to meet with anyone who needed extra help and always made class fun. Easy to joke with and get to know. overall and awesome person. Not too hard on grading, more worried about your own improvement. Try to get this girl as a TA!

She's a little disorganized and runs late often, but she is very interested in having her students do well. If you need help, she is more than willing to help. This will not be a blow off class, though. Be prepared to work for your 2 credits. And you will have to read the text book, but it's not too bad.
Very unorganized, does everything completely by the textbook.  Relatively easy grader, but irritating during class because she focusses on unimportant topics.
